getwd()

# using read.table to read in both the files

genes <- read.table(file = "QBS103_GSE157103_genes.csv",
                       sep = "\t", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

series_matrix <- read.table(file = "QBS103_GSE157103_series_matrix.csv",
                       sep = "\t", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

# trying to find common columns within the two files

head(genes)
head(series_matrix)

genes_long <- reshape2::melt(genes, id.vars = "QBS103_GSE157103_genes")

merged_data <- merge(genes_long, series_matrix, by = "participant id")
